titleStmt.title: The Odcombian banquet: dished foorth by Thomas the Coriat, and serued in by a number of noble wits in prayse of his Crudities and Crambe too. Asinus portans mysteria
titleStmt.author: Coryate, Thomas, ca. 1577-1617. Coryats crudities.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by George Eld] for Thomas Thorp,

notesStmt.note: "Largely a pirated reprint of the prelims. of [Coryate, Thomas. Coryats crudities]"--STC.
Running title reads: Panegyricke verses vpon the author and his booke.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
